lead_paragraph: Jamal Crawford scored 30 points and hit a game-winning 3-pointer with less than a second remaining to lift the short-handed Los Angeles Clippers to a shocking 102-99 overtime victory against the Utah Jazz on Friday.

headline.print_headline: Crawford Three-Pointer Lifts Clippers to Win Over Jazz
headline.main: Crawford Three-Pointer Lifts Clippers to Win Over Jazz

snippet: Jamal Crawford scored 30 points and hit a game-winning 3-pointer with less than a second remaining to lift the short-handed Los Angeles Clippers to a shocking 102-99 overtime victory against the Utah Jazz on Friday....
